page.title: 04Life Styles
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF AN ELEVEN YEAR OLD. I wake up at between half past six and seven o'clock, and have a cup of tea. Then I go and make my bed and get dressed. I usually have cornflakes for breakfast. After breakfast I get my shoes on and go to school for nine o'clock. At school we start with Assembly and then have English until break.After break we have recorder lessons and maths until 12 o'clock, when I go home for dinner. I like scrambled egg. About 12.30 I go back to school so I can play with my friends for half an hour. At one o'clock we have music, then we go to the swimming baths. When I get home at 3.30 I go and call on my friends until 5.00.After tea I play out again then I go home and watch television until bed time.
